name: Depression_ClinicalGroupingCondition_ICD9
title: Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition_ICD9
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Depression Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Depression Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Depression Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Depression Codes that constitute the Depression Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
